title: Patent Bending
overview:
The series is based on building some of the weird, fantastical ideas 
inventors have patented over the last century. Once physically realised,
 the flaws in these ideas tend to be humorously obvious and explain the 
ideas' lack of commercial success. The team then tries to come up with 
an improved version, thus the "bending" part of the title, meeting with 
varying results.
